summary: NMP contains 13 new Nebulae to choose from, includes pictures of each individual Nebula.
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://static.skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/29759-1-1357862064.png[/img]
[youtube]3Qv3KYQKM_0[/youtube]
Video by [url=http://www.youtube.com/user/hodilton?feature=watch]Hodilton[/url][/center]

[color=silver]NMP contains 13 new Nebulae to choose from. Includes pictures of each individual Nebula.

INSTALLATION:

1. Select a Nebula & open the folder
2. Drag the \'Data\' folder into your Skyrim directory, merge & overwrite any files.
3. Enjoy![/color]

[color=silver]Credits:

-Google Images.
-Paint.net + Various Plug-Ins.
-Adobe Photoshop CS6.[/color]


[color=black]Try out my other mod.[/color]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29304]Moons Mega Pack[/url]
author: Twisted Method
